resources.string: Testing of your memory using pictures you have selected.

1.Search for a category of pictures e.g. 'nature' or 'music' or enter url to search. 
 2.Select 6 pictures and your game will load. 
 3.Turn over any two cards. 
 4.If the cards match, you get a point. If they don't, they will turn back over. 
 5.The game ends when all cards have been matched.

Team 10: 
 Chua Ya Zhen 
 Lim Yee Jean 
 Ma Zi Wang (Austin) 
 Ngu Myat Che Zaw

 Yue Peng Cheng
